$comment: Based, with some modification & customization, on https://json.schemastore.org/catalog-info.json.
description: Like Domain entities, System entities are a little different than other entity types. Most of them represent bounded contexts, and will therefore "contain" Component, API, and Resource entities via those entities spec.system property. There are a few Systems that will be outside of our bounded context model however. These Systems will include things like TechHub, pipeline tooling, and anything else of a nonfunctional nature (authentication, observability, infrastructure systems, etc.).Once a Component, Resource, or API is created to implement a Domain, a System entity should be created and linked to that Domain with the spec.domain property (see below).More info @ https://techhub.mktp.io/docs/default/system/techhub/catalog-info-entities/system/ .

owner.description:
An entity reference to the owner of the System.
This should usually not be specified because the owner will be automatically determined via this repository's CODEOWNERS file.

domain.description: An entity reference to the domain that the system belongs to.
